00090 
00091 template <typename PixelType>
00092 TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::TBitmapIterator(const iimg::IBitmap* bitmapPtr, const i2d::CRectangle* regionPtr)
00093        :m_currentPixel(bitmapPtr->GetComponentsCount())
00094 {
00095        I_ASSERT(bitmapPtr != NULL);
00096 
00097        i2d::CRectangle imageRegion(bitmapPtr->GetImageSize());
00098        if (regionPtr != NULL){
00099               imageRegion = regionPtr->GetIntersection(imageRegion);
00100        }
00101 
00102        int imageHeight = bitmapPtr->GetImageSize().GetY();
00103        m_linesDifference = bitmapPtr->GetLinesDifference();
00104        m_imageBufferBeginPtr = (PixelType*)bitmapPtr->GetLinePtr(0);
00105        m_imageBufferEndPtr = m_imageBufferBeginPtr + imageHeight * m_linesDifference;
00106 
00107        m_imageBufferPtr = const_cast<PixelType*>(m_imageBufferBeginPtr) + int(imageRegion.GetTop()) * m_linesDifference + int(imageRegion.GetLeft());
00108        
00109        m_endIndex = istd::CIndex2d(int(imageRegion.GetWidth()), int(imageRegion.GetHeight()));
00110        m_index = istd::CIndex2d(int(imageRegion.GetLeft()), int(imageRegion.GetTop()));
00111        m_startIndex = m_index;
00112        m_bytesPerPixel = bitmapPtr->GetPixelBitsCount() / 8;
00113 }

00134        m_currentPixel.SetPixelBuffer(m_imageBufferPtr);

00151 template <typename PixelType>
00152 inline bool TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::IsValid() const
00153 {
00154        return (m_imageBufferPtr >= m_imageBufferBeginPtr && 
00155                      m_imageBufferPtr < m_imageBufferEndPtr);
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 template <typename PixelType>
00160 inline bool TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::AtEnd() const
00161 {
00162        return (m_index < m_startIndex || m_index >= m_endIndex);
00163 }

00166 template <typename PixelType>
00167 inline void TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::MoveTo(int x, int y)
00168 {
00169        m_imageBufferPtr = const_cast<PixelType*>(m_imageBufferBeginPtr) + x * m_bytesPerPixel + y * m_linesDifference;
00170 }

00174 inline void TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::MoveTo(const istd::CIndex2d& index)
00175 {

00289 template <typename PixelType>
00290 inline void TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::Move(int difference)
00291 {
00292        int currentX = m_index.GetX();
00293        int currentY = m_index.GetY();
00294 
00295        int dx = difference % m_linesDifference;
00296        int dy = difference / m_linesDifference;
00297 
00298        currentX += dx;
00299 
00300        if (currentX >= m_linesDifference){
00301               currentX %= m_linesDifference;
00302               ++dy;
00303        }
00304        else if(currentX < 0){
00305               currentX = m_linesDifference + currentX;
00306               --dy;
00307        }
00308 
00309        currentY += dy;
00310 
00311        m_index.SetX(currentX);
00312        m_index.SetY(currentY);
00313 
00314        MoveTo(m_index);
00315 }
00316 
00317        
00318 template <typename PixelType>
00319 inline void TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::IncreaseIndex()
00320 {
00321        int currentX = m_index.GetX();
00322        ++currentX;
00323 
00324        if (currentX >= m_endIndex.GetX()){
00325               currentX %= m_endIndex.GetX();
00326 
00327               m_index.SetY(m_index.GetY() + 1);
00328        }
00329 
00330        m_index.SetX(currentX);
00331 
00332        MoveTo(m_index);
00333 }
00334 
00335 
00336 template <typename PixelType>
00337 inline void TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::DecreaseIndex()
00338 {
00339        int currentX = m_index.GetX();
00340        --currentX;
00341 
00342        if (currentX < 0){
00343               currentX = m_endIndex.GetX() + currentX;
00344 
00345               m_index.SetY(m_index.GetY() - 1);
00346        }
00347 
00348        m_index.SetX(currentX);
00349 
00350        MoveTo(m_index);
00351 }
